ComicInfo.Title: [Cracked Poster #181]: The Cracked State of the Nation Chart; America's Greatest Hero; The Cracked Book of Handy Hints; What We'll Miss When the 80's Become the 'Good Old Days'; Things We Can Do Without; The JR Jr Family Photo Album; The Factors of Life; The Cracked Guide to Golf; Jobs You Never Dreamed Someone Does; In the Electronic Game Room; Cracked Interviews the Video King; Shut-Ups!
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.A satire of the television series THE GREATEST AMERICAN HERO.
A satire of the television THE FACTS OF LIFE.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:42:28. [Issue ID 250542]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin, Don Orehek, Sam Whitehead, Warren Sattler, Su Gumen, Bill Ward
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin, Don Orehek, Sam Whitehead, Warren Sattler, Su Gumen, Bill Ward
